messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] house rules was Re: Adult time
messages.msgSnippet: Hmmmm.... how would you recommend changing (or telling your kids to ignore) others house rules? Especially people that should be respected, like grandparents?
messages.messageBody:
Hmmmm.... how would you recommend changing (or telling your kids to ignore) others' house rules? Especially people that should be respected, like grandparents? (honestly curious and interested)
Myranda

<snip> they'd also have to
believe you'd protect them from others limiting them, i.e, you would not
have a different set of rules at your parents house). <snip>
Pam


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
